description: Zoho Books handles accounting, invoicing, and expense tracking, offering real-time collaboration and integrations within the Zoho ecosystem

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_ACCEPT_ESTIMATE
capabilities.description: Tool to mark an estimate as accepted. Use after reviewing and confirming the estimate.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_BULK_EXPORT_INVOICES_PDF
capabilities.description: Tool to export multiple invoices to a single PDF. Use when you have up to 25 invoice IDs ready to merge.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_BULK_PRINT_INVOICES
capabilities.description: Tool to bulk print up to 25 invoices as a single PDF. Use when you have multiple invoice IDs and need a combined PDF for printing.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CATEGORIZE_UNCATEGORIZED_TRANSACTION
capabilities.description: Tool to categorize an uncategorized bank transaction. Use after fetching an uncategorized entry to assign proper type and details.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_BANK_ACCOUNT
capabilities.description: Tool to create a bank or credit card account. Use when you need to add a new bank or credit card account to your Zoho Books organization.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_BANK_TRANSACTION
capabilities.description: Tool to create a manual bank transaction. Use when you need to record a non-invoice bank movement in Zoho Books after obtaining valid account IDs.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_CONTACT
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new contact in Zoho Books. Use when adding a customer or vendor after gathering details.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_ESTIMATE
capabilities.description: Tool to create an estimate (quote). Use when you need to raise a new customer quote in Zoho Books.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_EXCHANGE_RATE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new exchange rate for a currency. Use after confirming currency_id and organization_id.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new invoice. Use when you need to bill a customer with line items.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new item (product or service). Use when you need to add new items with pricing and inventory details.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_SALES_ORDER
capabilities.description: Tool to create a sales order. Use when you need to record a new sales order in Zoho Books.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_CREATE_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new user in Zoho Books. Use when inviting a team member to your organization.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_DELETE_BANK_TRANSACTION
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific bank transaction. Use when you need to remove an existing transaction after confirming its ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_DELETE_CONTACT
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific contact. Use when you need to remove an existing contact after confirming its ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_DELETE_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific invoice. Use when you need to remove an existing invoice after confirming its ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_DELETE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific item. Use when you need to remove an unused item after confirming it has no linked transactions.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_EMAIL_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to send an invoice email. Use after invoice creation to share it with the customer.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_GET_BANK_ACCOUNT
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch details of a specific bank account. Use when you need full metadata of one account by ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_GET_BILL
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch details of a specific bill. Use after confirming the organization context.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_GET_CONTACT
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch details of a specific contact. Use when you need to retrieve comprehensive contact information after obtaining the contact_id.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_GET_ESTIMATE
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch details of a specific estimate. Use when you need to retrieve all attributes of an existing estimate by its ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_GET_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch details of a specific invoice. Use when you need the full invoice record by its ID after creation or listing.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_GET_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch details of a specific item. Use when you need to retrieve all attributes of an existing item by its ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_GET_SALES_ORDER
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch details of a specific sales order. Use when you need the full record of a sales order by its ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_GET_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch details of a specific user. Use after obtaining the user_id to retrieve comprehensive user information.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_BANK_ACCOUNTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list bank and credit card accounts. Use when retrieving all accounts for reconciliation or overview.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_BANK_TRANSACTIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list bank transactions with optional filters. Use when you need to retrieve transactions for reconciliation and reporting.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_BILLS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of bills. Use when listing bills with filters and pagination.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list chart of accounts. Use when you need to fetch all chart of accounts with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_CONTACTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of contacts with optional filters. Use when you need to fetch and filter contacts from Zoho Books before processing them.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_CURRENCIES
capabilities.description: Tool to list currencies configured for the organization. Use after authentication to retrieve all currency settings.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_INVOICE_PAYMENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list payments recorded against an invoice. Use when retrieving all payment transactions applied to a specific invoice.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_INVOICES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of invoices with filters and search. Use when you need to fetch and filter invoices before processing.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of items from Zoho Books. Use when you need to list items with optional filters, search, and sorting.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_ORGANIZATIONS

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_SALES_ORDERS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of sales orders. Use when browsing sales orders by organization with optional sorting and filtering.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_LIST_USERS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a paginated list of users. Use when you need to fetch and browse users of an organization in Zoho Books.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_MARK_CONTACT_AS_ACTIVE
capabilities.description: Tool to mark a contact as active. Use when you need to reactivate a previously deactivated contact after confirming its ID.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_MARK_INVOICE_AS_SENT
capabilities.description: Tool to mark an invoice as Sent. Use after the invoice is finalized and ready for delivery to the customer.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_OPEN_SALES_ORDER
capabilities.description: Tool to mark a sales order as Open. Use when a sales order in Draft status needs to be opened for processing.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_REMIND_CUSTOMER_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to send a payment reminder for an invoice. Use when invoice is in Open or Overdue status.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_UPDATE_BILL
capabilities.description: Tool to update a vendor bill. Use when you need to modify an existing bill in Zoho Books. Use after fetching the current bill details.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_UPDATE_CONTACT
capabilities.description: Tool to update details of a contact. Use when you need to modify any contact attribute after verifying contact_id.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_UPDATE_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to update details of a specific invoice. Use when you need to modify an existing invoice in Zoho Booksâ€”change line items, dates, or other invoice fields. Requires invoice ID and organization ID before calling.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_UPDATE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to update details of a specific item. Use when you need to modify an existing item's attributes after fetching its current state.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_UPDATE_SALES_ORDER
capabilities.description: Tool to update a specific sales order. Use when you need to modify an existing sales order (e.g., change dates, line items, or custom fields) after creation.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_BOOKS_VOID_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to mark an invoice as Void. Use when you need to void an existing invoice after reviewing any outstanding payments.
